name: HuggingFace
description: Integrate with HuggingFace to inference, list, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Inference
tools.description: Run inference on a HuggingFace model. Supports text generation, summarization, classification, and more depending on the model.

tools.name: List Models
tools.description: Search and list models on HuggingFace Hub. Filter by search query, author, or task.

tools.name: Get Model
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific HuggingFace model including description, tags, downloads, and config.

tools.name: List Datasets
tools.description: Search and list datasets on HuggingFace Hub. Filter by search query, author, or task.

tools.name: List Spaces
tools.description: Search and list Spaces on HuggingFace Hub. Spaces are hosted ML demo apps (Gradio, Streamlit, etc.).
